content.question: Neo-Malthusian theory can be used to explain which of the following situations?

choices.label: Brazilâ€™s interior was previously unfit for farming, but recently more land is being cultivated.
Mexico has utilized new technology to shift from being a food importer to being a food exporter.
Malawi previously experienced famine but has improved agricultural yields through subsidies.
India has been able to increase agricultural yields by utilizing bio-engineered seeds.
South Sudan experienced famine during the twenty-first century as a result of war and drought.

content.answer: South Sudan experienced famine during the twenty-first century as a result of war and drought.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain spatial relationships in a specified context or region of the world, using geographic concepts, processes, models, or theories.
